= Google Chrome Native Client =

Can be running under Windows/Linux/Mac OS/Google Chrome OS.

Required WebGL support (OpenGL ES > 2.0) and Google Chrome version > 16.

If you download version from [http://code.google.com/p/unrealspeccyp/downloads/list "Downloads"] section, then for installing it you need to enable Native Client in "about:flags" page.

Also you can install it with Chrome Web Store from [https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/jfkpejkiedieehgdecgcjbmcbpihimmb this link]. In this case enabling of Native Client from "about:flags" is not required.
